#ifndef BEAST_LIVE_LIGHT_H
#define BEAST_LIVE_LIGHT_H

#define _USE_MATH_DEFINES
#include "mayacallbacks/nodemessageobject.h"
#include <maya/MNodeMessage.h>
#include <maya/MFnNonExtendedLight.h>
#include <maya/MFnSpotLight.h>
#include <maya/MFnDirectionalLight.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <string>
#include "beastutils.h"
#include "scenemanager.h"

namespace beastmaya {

class LiveLight : public NodeMessageObject {
public:
        LiveLight(const MObject& object, const BeastLightPtr& bl, SceneManager& sm, ResourceManager& rm);
        virtual void onAttributeChanged(MNodeMessage::AttributeMessage msg, MPlug& plug1, MPlug& plug2);
private:
        BeastLightPtr m_light;
        SceneManager& m_sm;
        ResourceManager& m_rm;
};

void LiveLight::onAttributeChanged(MNodeMessage::AttributeMessage msg, MPlug& plug1, MPlug& plug2) {
        MStatus res;
        MFnNonExtendedLight l(m_o, &res);

        std::wstring plugName = getPlugName(plug1);

        if(res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                if (msg & MNodeMessage::kAttributeSet) {
                        if(plugName == L"color") {
                                std::pair<MObject, std::wstring> colorConnection = getConnectedNode(l, L"color");
                                if (colorConnection.first == MObject::kNullObj) {
                                        m_light->setColor(toLinearBeastColorRGB(l.color()));
                                } else {
                                        m_light->setColor(ILBLinearRGB(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f));
                                }
                        }
                        else if (plugName == L"intensity") {
                                m_light->setIntensity(l.intensity());
                        }
                        else if (plugName == L"useRayTraceShadows" || plugName == L"useDepthMapShadows") {
                                m_light->setCastShadows(l.useRayTraceShadows() || l.useDepthMapShadows());
                        }
                        else if (plugName == L"lightRadius") {
                                m_light->setShadowRadius(l.shadowRadius());
                        }
                        else if (plugName == L"coneAngle" || plugName == L"penumbraAngle" || plugName == L"beastPenumbraExponent") {
                                MFnSpotLight l(m_o);
                                float penumbraExponent = 5.0f;
                                getPlugValue(l, L"beastPenumbraExponent", penumbraExponent);
                                m_light->setSpotlightCone(float(l.coneAngle()), float(l.penumbraAngle()), penumbraExponent);
                        }
                        else if (plugName == L"beastNearClipDistance" || plugName == L"beastFarClipDistance") {
                                float nearDistance = 0.0f;
                                float farDistance = FLT_MAX;
                                getPlugValue(l, L"beastNearClipDistance", nearDistance);
                                getPlugValue(l, L"beastFarClipDistance", farDistance);
                                m_light->setClippingPlanes(nearDistance, farDistance);
                        }
                        else if (plugName == L"lightAngle") {
                                MFnDirectionalLight l(m_o);
                                float angleRadians = std::min(l.shadowAngle() * float(M_PI) / 180.0f, float(M_PI));
                                m_light->setShadowAngle(angleRadians);
                        }
                        else if (plugName == L"beastDirectScale" || plugName == L"beastIndirectScale") {
                                float directScale = 1.0f;
                                float indirectScale = 1.0f;
                                getPlugValue(l, L"beastDirectScale", directScale);
                                getPlugValue(l, L"beastIndirectScale", indirectScale);
                                m_light->setIntensityScale(directScale, indirectScale);
                        }
                        else if (plugName == L"beastFalloffType" || plugName == L"beastFalloffRange" || plugName == L"beastFalloffExponent" || plugName == L"beastFalloffClamp" ||
                                                plugName == L"beastFalloffConstant" || plugName == L"beastFalloffLinear" || plugName == L"beastFalloffQuadratic" || plugName == L"decayRate") {
                                setLightFalloff(l, m_light);
                        }
                        else if (plugName == L"visibility") {
                                bool visibility = true;
                                getPlugValue(l, L"visibility", visibility);
                                m_light->setLightStats(ILB_RS_VISIBLE_FOR_EYE, visibility);
                        }
                        else if (plugName == L"beastVisibleForReflections") {
                                bool beastVisibleForReflections = true;
                                getPlugValue(l, L"beastVisibleForReflections", beastVisibleForReflections);
                                m_light->setLightStats(ILB_RS_VISIBLE_FOR_REFLECTIONS, beastVisibleForReflections);
                        }
                        else if (plugName == L"beastVisibleForRefractions") {
                                bool beastVisibleForRefractions = true;
                                getPlugValue(l, L"beastVisibleForRefractions", beastVisibleForRefractions);
                                m_light->setLightStats(ILB_RS_VISIBLE_FOR_REFRACTIONS, beastVisibleForRefractions);
                        }
                        else if (plugName == L"beastVisibleForGI") {
                                bool beastVisibleForGI = true;
                                getPlugValue(l, L"beastVisibleForGI", beastVisibleForGI);
                                m_light->setLightStats(ILB_RS_VISIBLE_FOR_GI, beastVisibleForGI);
                        }
                } else if (msg & MNodeMessage::kConnectionMade) {
                        if (m_o.hasFn(MFn::kVolumeLight)) {
                                if(plugName == L"color") {
                                        // We have a texture
                                        // Check if we are connected
                                        const bool isConnected = plug1.isConnected(&res);
                                        if(res == MStatus::kSuccess && isConnected) {
                                                // Looks like we have a texture
                                                std::pair<MObject, std::wstring> connection = getConnectedNode(l, plugName);
                                                if (connection.first != MObject::kNullObj) {
                                                        m_sm.addTextureCallback(connection.first);
                                                        m_sm.getLiveResourceManager().postUpdate(connection.first);
                                                }
                                        }
                                }
                        }
                } else if (msg & MNodeMessage::kConnectionBroken) {
                        if (m_o.hasFn(MFn::kVolumeLight)) {
                                if(plugName == L"color") {
                                        BeastTexturePtr texture = m_rm.getWhiteTexture();
                                        m_light->setSkylightTexture(*texture);
                                }
                        }
                }
        } 
}

LiveLight::LiveLight(const MObject& object, const BeastLightPtr& bl, SceneManager& sm, ResourceManager& rm) :
        NodeMessageObject(object), m_light(bl), m_sm(sm), m_rm(rm)
{
}

}

#endif // BEAST_LIVE_LIGHT_H
